resolution.summary: Fixed JAL return address bug with two changes: (1) moved regctl '101' case outside if idx/=0 guard in regbnk.vhd so JAL can write R15 regardless of SEL_W value, (2) added +1 to p_id_wb_iaddr_0 in ANEM.vhd for MIPS PC+2 convention. Removed all debug statements. All 14 tests pass.
